Text:

Confirmed working on Acekard 2 with AKAIO 1.7.1

Thank you for the upload. ^^

could someone help me?
im pretty much a noob at this and im stuck on what i should do next.
ive downloaded the file and its a torrent file
what do i do next?
how do i play it??
thank you

@hillxemec

Assuming you haven't already found out some answers, hit up Google and find utorrent (this is the simplest) and install that. Then, open up this torrent file inside it. There's heaps of tutorials on how to download with utorrent. THEN, you need a DS emulator like no$gba. Again, there are heaps of tutorials on how to get it running efficiently. Good luck!
